attributes.name: Haymarket Elevator 904 (Forest Hills platform to Congress Street lobby)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, take elevator 905, then turn right to reach Haymarket Elevator 906. Take 906 to the sub level, exit fare gates, and use elevator 908 to exit to the street. \nIf boarding, use Haymarket Elevator 903 to the Oak Grove platform, then 907 to cross under the Orange Line tracks, then 905 to reach the platform.

attributes.name: Hynes Convention Center fare vending machine 201225
North Station Escalator 392 (Forest Hills, Copley & West platform to Causeway Street lobby)
Government Center Escalator 444 (North Station & North platform to street)
Park Street Elevator 812 (Green Line underpass to Lechmere platform)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: Use Elevs 978 & 804 at street to switch btwn Green Line platforms.

attributes.name: North Station Elevator 910 (Lobby to Forest Hills, Copley & West platform)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, exit the train to Haymarket and return to North Station on an Oak Grove- (Orange Line) or Lechmere-/North Station- (Green Line) bound train. Alternatively, customers may exit at Haymarket, cross New Chardon Street, and travel three-tenths of a mile down Canal Street to North Station at Causeway Street.

properties.name: note
properties.value: Significant barriers exist at station, but customers may be able to board/exit train using mobile lift

attributes.name: Haymarket Elevator 907 (Underpass to Oak Grove platform)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, please use Haymarket Elevator 903 to go up to the lobby at Congress Street. \nIf you are transferring to the Green Line, take Haymarket Elevator 903 up to the lobby. At the lobby, take Haymarket Elevator 904 down to the Forest Hills platform. Exit to the left and travel to the end of the platform to use Haymarket Elevator 905 up to the sub level to exit. Turn right and proceed to Haymarket Elevator 906 to reach the Green Line platform.

attributes.name: Hynes Convention Center fare vending machine 202160

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: Customers desiring to exit the station must continue to St. Mary's (C-Line), or Fenway (D-Line) and transfer to inbound service back to Kenmore. \nCustomers desiring to enter the station for outbound service must use the inbound elevator and service to Copley or Arlington. Then transfer to outbound service.

attributes.name: North Station Escalator 385 (Valenti Way to Orange Line, Green Line lobby)
Hynes Convention Center fare vending machine 202159
Park Street Elevator 979 (Red Line center platform to Copley & West platform)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: Use Elevator 808 at end of Red Line platform connecting to lobby.

properties.value: Hourly: 30 Min: $8, 1 hr: $15, 1-2 hrs: $22, 2-3 hrs: $26, 3-12 hrs: $30 | Daily Max: $68 | Events: $48 | Early Bird (in by 9 AM, out by 6 PM): $24 | Nights/Weekends: $10

Haymarket Elevator 905 (Underpass to Forest Hills platform)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, please use Haymarket Elevator 904 to go up to the lobby at Congress Street. If you are transferring to the Green Line, take Haymarket Elevator 904 up to the lobby. At the lobby, take Haymarket Elevator 903 down to the Oak Grove platform. Exit to the right and travel to the end of the platform to use Haymarket Elevator 907 to cross under the Orange Line tracks. Upon exiting Haymarket Elevator 907, turn right and proceed to Haymarket Elevator 906 to reach the Green Line platform.

attributes.name: North Station Elevator 731 (Passageway to Causeway St.)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, travel down the passageway and use North Station Elevator 732 to reach Causeway Street. If boarding, exit through the east TD Garden entrance and follow the path to Causeway Street. At Causeway Street, turn right and use North Station Elevator 732 to reach the lobby.

properties.name: note
properties.value: Significant barriers exist at station, but customers may be able to board/exit train using mobile lift

Copley Elevator 977 (Kenmore & West, Heath Street lobby to street)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: Customers desiring to enter the station must use the inbound elevator and utilize service to Arlington for westbound service. Customers desiring to exit on the westbound side must continue to Kenmore and transfer to inbound service to Copley.

attributes.name: Arlington Escalator 435 (Park Street & North platform to paid lobby)
Copley Elevator 976 (Park Street & North lobby to street)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: Customers desiring to enter the station for inbound service must use the outbound elevator, utilize the B-, C-, or D-Line service to Kenmore, and then transfer to inbound service. Customers desiring to exit on the inbound side must continue to Arlington and transfer to outbound service back to Copley.

properties.name: alternate-service-text

Park Street customer service agent with blank CharlieCards
Arlington Elevator 963 (Park Street & North platform to lobby)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, exit the Green Line at Park Street and transfer to an outbound train. Use Arlington Elevator 962 to exit at Arlington. If boarding, use Arlington Elevator 962 to access an outbound train. Exit at Copley and switch to an inbound train.

attributes.name: North Station Elevator 909 (Orange Line, Green Line lobby to Valenti Way)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, travel along the Green Line platform to reach the main station lobby. Once there, pass through the fare gates. Turn right to use North Station Elevator 912 (lobby to Haverhill Street and Causeway Street) located adjacent to the fare gates. Alternatively, continue down the passageway towards the Commuter Rail to reach North Station Elevator 731 (passageway to Commuter Rail and TD Garden).\nIf boarding, travel one-tenth of a mile down Canal or Beverly Streets to the North Station entrances on Causeway Street.

attributes.name: North Station Elevator 732 (Passageway to Commuter Rail, TD Garden)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, travel down the passageway and use North Station Elevator 731 to reach Causeway Street. If boarding, exit through the east TD Garden entrance and follow the path to Causeway Street. At Causeway Street, turn right and use North Station Elevator 731 to reach the lobby.

attributes.name: North Station Elevator 912 (Orange Line, Green Line lobby to Causeway Street)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, travel down the passageway toward the Commuter Rail and use North Station Elevator 731 (passageway to Causeway Street). Alternatively, pass through the fare gates and walk the full length of the Green Line platform to reach the opposite lobby at Valenti Way. At this lobby, use North Station Elevator 909 (lobby to Valenti Way) to reach the street level. If boarding, cross Causeway Street to use North Station Elevator 731 to reach the lobby.

properties.name: note
properties.value: Significant barriers exist at station, but customers may be able to board/exit train using mobile lift

attributes.name: Kenmore Elevator 972 (Park Street & North platform to lobby, busway)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: Customers desiring elevator access to exit the station on the inbound side must continue to Copley or Arlington and transfer to outbound service back to Kenmore. Customers desiring inbound service can use the outbound elevator and take the C- or D-Line one stop and transfer back to inbound service. Please see station personnel for assistance.

attributes.name: Haymarket Elevator 906 (Underpass to Green Line platforms, busway)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If boarding/exiting the Green Line, use Haymarket Elevator 908 at the New Sudbury and New Chardon Streets entrance to enter the Green Line. If boarding/exiting the Orange Line, use Elevators 903 or 904 at the Congress Street entrance.

attributes.name: Kenmore Escalator 432 (Park Street & North platform to lobby)

properties.name: fee-daily
properties.value: Weekdays - 30 min or less: $6, 1 hr: $10, 1.5 hrs: $15, 2 hrs: $20, 3 hrs: $25, 4 hrs: $28, over 4 hrs until 5 AM: $33. | Nights and Weekends - 30 min or less: $6, 1 hr: $10, 1.5 hrs: $15, over 1.5 hrs until 5 AM: $16

properties.name: fee-monthly
properties.value: Regular monthly: $340, North End resident: $150, Reverse commute (4 PM - 9 AM): $125

attributes.name: Park Street Elevator 804 (Government Center & North lobby to Tremont Street, Winter Street)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: Use Park St Elev 892 @ Winter & Washington Sts or Elev 978 on Boston Common.

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, exit the Green Line at Copley and see station personnel or use the call box to request assistance. If boarding, see station personnel or use the call box at Arlington to request assistance.

attributes.name: Government Center Escalator 446 (Blue Line platform to Green Line platform)
Park Street Elevator 808 (Red Line center platform to Government Center & North platform, Winter Street Concourse)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: Use Elevator 979 connecting Red Line center platform to Green Line west, & add'l elevator to street

attributes.name: Arlington Elevator 962 (Copley & West platform to lobby)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, exit the Green Line at Copley and transfer to inbound service back to Arlington to utilize Arlington Elevator 963. If boarding, use Arlington Elevator 963 to access an inbound train to Park Street and switch to an outbound train.

attributes.name: Haymarket Elevator 903 (Oak Grove platform to Congress Street lobby)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting the station, take elevator 906, turn right, and take elevator 905 to the Oak Grove platform. \nIf boarding from the street, use Elevator 904 to the Forest Hills platform, then elevators 905 and 906 to cross under the Orange Line tracks.

attributes.name: Copley Escalator 439 (Kenmore & West, Heath Street lobby to street)
Haymarket Elevator 908 (Green Line lobby to busway, Sudbury Street, New Chardon Street)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting the Green Line, take elevator 906 down, then elevator 905 up, and elevator 904 to the exit.\nIf boarding use the Orange Line lobby at Congress Street.

attributes.name: North Station Elevator 911 (Oak Grove platform to paid lobby)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, take the Orange Line to Community College and return to North Station on a Forest Hills-bound train and exit using North Station Elevator 910. If boarding, use North Station Elevator 910 to board a Forest Hills-bound train. At Haymarket, switch to an Oak Grove-bound train. \nAlternatively, customers may exit at Haymarket, cross New Chardon Street, and travel three-tenths of a mile down Canal Street to North Station at Causeway Street.
